description: Try our easy to follow Rustic One-Pan Lasagne recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Rustic One-Pan Lasagne Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Grease a deep 12-cup capacity baking dish.
Combine mince, onion, carrot, mushroom and garlic in a bowl. Roughly chop half the basil, add to bowl with mince and mix together well. Combine ricotta and milk in a separate bowl.

Spread 1/2 cup passata over base of dish. Layer 2 lasagne sheets over passata, cutting to fit if necessary, then spread over a third each of mince mixture, remaining passata, ricotta and parmesan. Repeat layers twice more. Sprinkle over mozzarella.
Cover dish with foil and bake for 45 minutes. Remove foil and cook for 30 minutes or until cheese is golden. Garnish with remaining basil.
